amendment.description: To provide that Federal employees shall be limited to the remedies available under chapters 12 and 23 of title 5, United States Code, for any violation of the whistleblower provisions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4123 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4123 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1695) To provide that Federal employees shall be limited to the remedies available under chapters 12 and 23 of title 5, United States Code, for any violation of the whistleblower provisions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4123 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4123 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Collins.
